alert.note: Alert for Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 4:47PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of through 515 PM PDT... ... ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL PLUMAS COUNTY THROUGH 515 PM PDT... At 446 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Genesee, or 11 miles northeast of Quincy. This thunderstorm was nearly stationary and producing heavy rain. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Crescent Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
